item.title: I'm joining Hashnode ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰
item.description: Hello, Awesome, Super excited to announce that I’ll be joining the awesome team at Hashnode ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ I’ll be handling Developer Relations and my main priority would be building relationships with the super awesome developers using our platform(s) and creating a thriving ecosystem for our own community of developers. At Hashnode, we focus more on inclusion, compassion and collaboration and our mission is to build a community of software developers, collaborating together to build an open and inclusive environment.
